sage.audio

Interface IAudioManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioManager, JOALAudioManager

    public interface IAudioManager
    The IAudioManager interface exposes the public methods that all audio managers must implement.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett, Mike McShaffry
    See Also:
    Game Coding Complete

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AudioResource createAudioResource(java.lang.String soundName, AudioResourceType type)
      Creates and returns a new AudioResource.
      IAudioEar getEar()
      Returns the IAudioEar attached to the IAudioManager.
      boolean getIsActive()
      Returns true if the audio system is active; false otherwise.
      int getMasterVolume()
      Returns the master (global) volume of the sound system.
      IAudioPlayer initAudioPlayer(AudioResource resource, SoundType type)
      Creates a new IAudioPlayer and registers it to the IAudioManager.
      boolean initialize()
      Initializes the audio system.
      void pauseAllSounds()
      Pauses all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.
      void pauseAllSounds(SoundType type)
      Pauses all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager.
      void releaseAudioPlayer(IAudioPlayer audioPlayer)
      Unregisters the IAudioPlayer from the IAudioManager, and releases the player back to memory.
      void resumeAllSounds()
      Resumes playing all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.
      void resumeAllSounds(SoundType type)
      Resumes playing all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager.
      void setMasterVolume(int volume)
      Sets the master (global) volume for all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.
      void setVolumeForType(SoundType type, int volume)
      Sets the volume for for sounds of a specific SoundType.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the audio system.
      void stopAllSounds()
      Stops all sounds registered with the IAudioManager from playing.
      void stopAllSounds(SoundType type)
      Stops all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager from playing.

    • Method Detail

      • getIsActive

        boolean getIsActive()
        Returns true if the audio system is active; false otherwise.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

      • createAudioResource

        AudioResource createAudioResource(java.lang.String soundName,
                                  AudioResourceType type)
        Creates and returns a new AudioResource.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

        Parameters:
        soundName - - The name of the sound file (full path and file extension required)
        type - - The AudioResourceType of audio resource being loaded.

      • initAudioPlayer

        IAudioPlayer initAudioPlayer(AudioResource resource,
                             SoundType type)
        Creates a new IAudioPlayer and registers it to the IAudioManager.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

        Parameters:
        resource - - The AudioResource containing the sound data.
        type - - The SoundType of the audio player.
        Returns:
        The new IAudioPlayer

      • releaseAudioPlayer

        void releaseAudioPlayer(IAudioPlayer audioPlayer)
        Unregisters the IAudioPlayer from the IAudioManager, and releases the player back to memory.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

        Parameters:
        audioPlayer - - The audio player to release.

      • getEar

        IAudioEar getEar()
        Returns the IAudioEar attached to the IAudioManager.

        NOTE: The implementation of this method is dependent upon whether or not the IAudioManager implementation supports 3D sound.

      • stopAllSounds

        void stopAllSounds()
        Stops all sounds registered with the IAudioManager from playing.

      • stopAllSounds

        void stopAllSounds(SoundType type)
        Stops all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager from playing.

      • pauseAllSounds

        void pauseAllSounds()
        Pauses all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.

      • pauseAllSounds

        void pauseAllSounds(SoundType type)
        Pauses all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager.

      • resumeAllSounds

        void resumeAllSounds()
        Resumes playing all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.

      • resumeAllSounds

        void resumeAllSounds(SoundType type)
        Resumes playing all sounds of a specific SoundType registered with the IAudioManager.

      • getMasterVolume

        int getMasterVolume()
        Returns the master (global) volume of the sound system.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

      • setMasterVolume

        void setMasterVolume(int volume)
        Sets the master (global) volume for all sounds registered with the IAudioManager.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

      • setVolumeForType

        void setVolumeForType(SoundType type,
                      int volume)
        Sets the volume for for sounds of a specific SoundType.

      • initialize

        boolean initialize()
        Initializes the audio system.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.

        Returns:
        True if initialization was successful; false otherwise.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown the audio system.

        NOTE: This method is implementation dependent.
